thread.title: Robin Lopez And Serge Ibaka Actually Fight And Throw Real Punches At Each Other During Raps-Bulls Game
thread.title_full: Robin Lopez And Serge Ibaka Actually Fight And Throw Real Punches At Each Other During Raps-Bulls Game

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Robin Lopez And Serge Ibaka Actually Fight And Throw Real Punches At Each Other During Raps-Bulls Game
text:
Things got heated in tonight’s Raptors-Bulls game when Serge Ibaka and Robin Lopez actually came to blows during the third quarter. 
It's getting heated in Toronto as both Robin Lopez and Serge Ibaka are ejected after this play. #BullsTalk pic.twitter.com/3ufqsbrwKG 
— CSN Chicago (@CSNChicago) March 22, 2017 

Both players got ejected even though neither truly landed their punches.
